definitions.definition: The distance covered by a long step.
The number of memory locations between successive elements in an array , pixels in a bitmap , etc.

A jazz piano style of the 1920s and 1930s. The left hand characteristically plays a four-beat pulse with a single bass note, octave, seventh or tenth interval on the first and third beats, and a chord on the second and fourth beats.

main_definition: ( countable ) A long step in walking.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) The distance covered by a long step.
( countable , computing ) The number of memory locations between successive elements in an array , pixels in a bitmap , etc.

( uncountable , music ) A jazz piano style of the 1920s and 1930s. The left hand characteristically plays a four-beat pulse with a single bass note, octave, seventh or tenth interval on the first and third beats, and a chord on the second and fourth beats.
